name: Oba Adesesan Afolorunso
quote: A visionary monarch dedicated to modernizing Ijebu-Ife while preserving its rich cultural heritage .

name: Ven. Jacob Rotimi Olowomeye
quote: A devoted spiritual leader whose guidance at Christ Anglican Church Iwade strengthens the moral fabric of Ijebu-Ife.

name: Mr. Akeem Ogunkoya
quote: A committed community figure whose efforts as Agbaman uplift Ijebu-Ife’s cultural and social vitality.

name: Abdulsalam Ibrahim
quote: A unifying spiritual leader as Chief Imam, fostering peace and interfaith harmony in Ijebu-Ife’s diverse community and fostering community unity.

name: Mr. Ademola Adenubi
quote: An innovative entrepreneur whose leadership at Edutams Limited drives educational and economic growth in Ijebu-Ife.

name: Rear Admiral Kolawole Olumide Oguntuga
quote: A beacon of discipline and excellence, inspiring Ijebu-Ife’s youth to pursue greatness through service and resilience.

name: Chief P.O. Orunmuyi
quote: A passionate advocate for youth empowerment and cultural preservation in Ijebu-Ife, driving progress through selfless leadership.

name: Chief S.O. Ogundare
quote: A steadfast pillar of Ijebu-Ife, championing community welfare and traditional values with unwavering commitment.

name: Chief Adetayo Adenuga
quote: A generous benefactor whose contributions to Ijebu-Ife’s development uplift lives and strengthen communal bonds.

name: Prince Oyebanjo Amos
quote: A trailblazer in social integration, fostering harmony and growth within Ijebu-Ife’s diverse community.

name: Chief Olufemi Olukayode
quote: A guardian of tradition, promoting Ijebu-Ife’s cultural legacy through dedicated leadership and community service.

name: Olaitan Agboola
quote: A dynamic ambassador of Ijebu-Ife, amplifying its cultural pride and influence on a national stage.

name: Chief Olugbenga Shomade
quote: A respected leader whose wisdom and advocacy elevate Ijebu-Ife’s voice in regional development.
